title: Husires
author: Husires
created_time: March 03, 2023, 05:31:54 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 11:18:45 AM by Husires
content: Bisq is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoin in exchange for national currencies, or alternative cryptocurrencies.This is a free campaign; you will not paid for wearing these signatures/avatar.there is no weekly post minimum/maximum or spreadsheet.Feel free to wear or remove signature/avatar but DONT SPAM.QuoteProposalOn March 20th 2023 we will try to get as many people as possible to place offers on Bisq as a way to kick-start liquidity and also launch the newest release. Bisq 2.0.ObjectiveReach maximum number of offers published during 1 day.If we can reach 1000 offers published on one day we will see a new high in number of trades.Please add a 👍 below if you will participate!Source: https://github.com/bisq-network/growth/issues/274Some useful links:https://bisq.network/https://bisq.network/downloads/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5230289.0https://docs.bisq.network/getting-started.htmlhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416294.0Read also Why KYC is extremely dangerous – and uselessAvatar OR Personal TextCode:Bisq Market Day - comments.body: Updated my signature and personal text, happy to be part of the Bisq campaign

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: RapTarX on March 03, 2023, 05:39:39 PMWho designed the signature?ME   I used this website https://asciiart.club/ with edited old signatures.I hope the results will be good, and I apologize if it was bad. The budget is zero.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: As a member, I can not help much with signature but I am happy to join and support Bisq Market Day.Great initiative to keep P2P marketplace alive after the shut down of LocalBitcoins after 10 years of operation.

comments.body: I also join other members to participate on the campaign to spread the good news of Bisq Market Day - March 20th 2023. I have worn the signature and personal text

comments.body: Count me in. I like the initiative you've made Husires and zwei for the contribution of the signature codes.I'm wearing all stuff now.
